title: FILM NOIR NIGHT AT THE BIJOU (double feature)

sources.title: FilmNoirNightAtTheBijoudoubleFeature
sources.description: A simulated double feature program at a second-run movie house. The dastardly deeds and desperate situations begin with coming attractions and a cartoon. Then Edmond O'Brien solves his own murder in the 4-star thriller, "D.O.A.," followed by a short subject, "Souvenirs of Death." Then in the critically acclaimed "Detour" Ann Savage is the psychotic pickup from hell who leads herself and Tom Neal to disaster. NOTE: The upgraded "D.O.A." print in this simulation has also been uploaded as a separate item under the title ""D.O.A.video quality upgrade"
